SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Priorita] ( [Priorita_Ky] tinyint NOT NULL , [Priorita_Descrizione] varchar(100) NULL , [Priorita_Colore] varchar(100) NULL , [Priorita_Icona] varchar(200) NULL , [Priorita_Ordine] int NULL , [Priorita_UserInsert] int NULL , [Priorita_UserUpdate] int NULL , [Priorita_UserDelete] int NULL , [Priorita_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [Priorita_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [Priorita_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Priorita] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_Priorita PRIMARY KEY ([Priorita_Ky])
